text: Timile kehi an'ya yasta manisaharu pani pa'une chau jo cahanchan ki timisita pani santipurvaka rahun ra aphno kaumama (jatima) pani suraksita rahun tara jaba danga phasada utpanna garna bola'inchan ta tyasama akrsta bha'i sakriya bha'ihalchan. Tasartha yasta manisahaharu yadi timisita sanyama na'apana'i timitira santika lagi sanvada gardainan ra aphna hatala'i rokdainan bhane jaham pa'e pani tinala'i samatera mara. Yi tinai hun jasamathi hamile timro adhipatya (varcasva) niscita gareka chaum
